attributes.action: To stop Testing and detaining children without parents permission Covid
attributes.additional_details: Because I know this as come in to question. Mentally it would cause so much damage to child it would be devastating. This shouldn’t of even been implemented or discussed or brought guests by children’s commissioners. As parent of a shy child. Clingy and loving it would break her heart and mine. And it would all parents. It inhuman!
attributes.background: I think this would be highly upsetting mentally and emotionally for the child & parent. It should not even be question. It would be damaging to both parties

rejection.details:
Children are not being detained and there are no plans to detain children. In most cases, medical treatment and testing already needs parental consent. We therefore don't know what you want to happen. 

You can find out more about what the Coronavirus Act and children here: 
https://fullfact.org/online/children-coronavirus-act/

You can find out how to spot false information online here: https://sharechecklist.gov.uk/ 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
